AB-CO Front-end & Communication Section

The Front-end and Communication section offers services related with the front-end computers' software and with the equipment communications.

The front-end computers are VME/LynxOS systems. PC/Linux systems are supported for analog signals observation (CompactPCI) and for IP gateways (no hardware interface).

Services:

  • To provide the development and operation environment for the control software on the front-end computers.

  • To provide drivers and I/O libraries, for the I/O boards supported by the AB/CO group.

  • To provide support for the equipment software development and operation.

  • To provide communications services to accelerator's equipment.

   

Contacts

The section member list can be found here

The section mailing list is ab-div-co-fc@cern.ch
